# (PART) Interactive Documents {-}

# Rmarkdown {#rmd-intro}

Rmarkdown [@R-rmarkdown] is an R package that allows the creation of documents from R, these range from presentations with xaringan [@R-xaringan], through dashboard with flexdashboard [@R-flexdashboard] to entire books such as this one with bookdown [@R-bookdown].

Many of these outputs being interactive HTML documents they allow using including JavaScript.

##Â Examples

Packages that make use of JavaScript to extend rmarkdown are numerous and very different in nature given the variety of outputs that can be produced.
